metadata.description: Curated collection of Claude Code plugins: NSIP breeding data, agents, git workflows, monitoring, document processing, ADR management, and project specification lifecycle

plugins.name: datadog
plugins.description: DataDog API specialists for monitoring setup, dashboard creation, metric queries, and APM integration

plugins.name: document-skills

plugins.name: documentation-review
plugins.description: Automated review of technical documentation for clarity, accuracy, and completeness using AI-powered analysis and best practices

plugins.name: human-voice
plugins.description: Detect and prevent AI-generated writing patterns to ensure authentic human voice in content with multi-tier analysis

plugins.name: adr
plugins.description: Complete ADR lifecycle management with multi-format support (MADR, Nygard, Y-Statement), compliance auditing, proactive detection, and configurable workflows

plugins.name: gh
plugins.description: Git workflow commands, GitHub Copilot configuration, and multi-CI migration to GitHub Actions

plugins.name: nsip
plugins.description: National Sheep Improvement Program breeding data with MCP tools, expert advisor agent, and smart hooks

plugins.name: zircote

plugins.name: claude-spec
plugins.description: Project specification lifecycle management with strategic planning, implementation tracking, and retrospectives

plugins.name: subcog
plugins.description: subcog is a Git-backed memory system for Claude Code, capturing decisions, learnings, and context as git notes with semantic search and automatic recall.
